mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pagopa_tr_bulk_registry ( bur_bulk_request_id, bur_x_correlation_id, bur_x_credential_id, bur_service_code, bur_elements_processed_count, bur_elements_count, bur_inserted_datetime, bur_bulk_status, bur_has_batch_elements ) VALUES ( #{bulkRequestId}, #{correlationId}, #{credentialId}, #{serviceCode}, 0, #{elementsCount}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{bulkStatus}, 0 )
mapper.update:
UPDATE pagopa_tr_bulk_registry br
br.bur_elements_processed_count = br.bur_elements_count, br.bur_bulk_status = 'COMPLETED', br.bur_completed_datetime = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
WHERE br.bur_bulk_status = 'PENDING' AND (1, br.bur_bulk_request_id) IN
(1, #{bulkRequestId})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM pagopa_tr_bulk_registry WHERE bur_bulk_status = 'PENDING' AND bur_has_batch_elements = 0 ORDER BY bur_inserted_datetime ASC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY

SELECT * FROM pagopa_tr_bulk_registry LEFT JOIN pagopa_tr_batch_registry ON bar_bulk_request_id = bur_bulk_request_id WHERE bur_bulk_status = 'PENDING' AND ( (bur_inserted_datetime + ((1/24) * #{hours}) <= systimestamp AND bar_batch_created_datetime IS NULL AND bur_has_batch_elements = 0) OR (select max(bar_batch_created_datetime) from pagopa_tr_batch_registry br where br.bar_bulk_request_id = bur_bulk_request_id) + ((1/24) * #{hours}) <= systimestamp )
SELECT bur_bulk_request_id FROM pagopa_tr_bulk_registry WHERE bur_bulk_status = 'COMPLETED' AND bur_completed_datetime + ((1/24) * #{hours}) <= systimestamp
SELECT * FROM pagopa_tr_bulk_registry br JOIN pagopa_tr_bulk_element be ON br.bur_bulk_request_id = be.bue_bulk_request_id WHERE br.bur_bulk_request_id = #{bulkRequestId}
